summary: A versatile young professional with a diversified track record in a public sector, an NGO, and a financial sector, and a private consulting/research company. A Master’s degree in international and development Economics from HTW Berlin, and B.A in Economics and Finance; progressively worked in data and policy analysis and recommendations, strategic plan preparation, monitoring and evaluation of projects/programs, financial/accounting analysis and practical and academic research. Currently working as 'financieel beheerser' in Provincie Zuid-Holland. Open to new opportunities and challenges!
